Pre-Game Insights: Canada is facing the reigning World Cup champions and the top-ranked team in FIFA, Argentina, in their Copa Am√©rica opener.
Argentina has a strong record with only two losses in the last 43 matches under manager Lionel Scaloni.
Canada's coach Jesse Marsch emphasized the difficulty of the match and the need for his team to perform at a high level.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is a significant test for Canada's national team as they aim to compete against one of the best teams in the world.
Several Canadian players have faced top-level competition at the club level, giving them experience against high-quality opponents.
Others: The match is being held at Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, Georgia.
Canada's players have different levels of experience facing Messi and other Argentine stars.
